Package com.mackenziehigh.snowflake

Enum NewlineStyles

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<NewlineStyles>
com.mackenziehigh.snowflake.NewlineStyles
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<NewlineStyles>
public enum NewlineStyles extends Enum<NewlineStyles>
This enumeration defines constants for various platform-dependent newlines sequences.
Author:
Michael Mackenzie High

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    CR
    This constant represents a newline that is a carriage-return (i.e.
    CR_LF
    This constant represents a newline that is a carriage-return followed by a line-feed.
    LF
    This constant represents a newline that is a line-feed (i.e.
    UNSUPPORTED
    This constant indicates that the newline-style is not currently supported.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • CR

      public static final NewlineStyles CR
      This constant represents a newline that is a carriage-return (i.e. \r).

    • LF

      public static final NewlineStyles LF
      This constant represents a newline that is a line-feed (i.e. \n).

    • CR_LF

      public static final NewlineStyles CR_LF
      This constant represents a newline that is a carriage-return followed by a line-feed.

    • UNSUPPORTED

      public static final NewlineStyles UNSUPPORTED
      This constant indicates that the newline-style is not currently supported.

  • Method Details

    • values

      public static NewlineStyles[] values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Returns:
      an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

    • valueOf

      public static NewlineStyles valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the enum constant to be returned.
      Returns:
      the enum constant with the specified name
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if this enum type has no constant with the specified name
      NullPointerException - if the argument is null

    • newline

      public String newline()
      This method retrieves a string containing the newline represented by this style.

      If this style is the UNSUPPORTED style, then an empty string is returned.

      Returns:
      the represented newline.

    • fromNewline

      public static NewlineStyles fromNewline(String newline)
      This method determines the best-matching newline-style constant for a given newline.

      The UNSUPPORTED style is returned, if the newline is unrecognized.

      Parameters:
      newline - is the newline that is represented by the returned constant.
      Returns:
      a constant that represent the given newline.

    • fromSystem

      public static NewlineStyles fromSystem()
      This method retrieves the best-matching newline-style for the current computer system.

      The platform newline is found using System.getProperty("line.separator").

      The UNSUPPORTED style is returned, if the newline is unrecognized.

      Returns:
      the aforedescribed newline-style.

    • fromGuess

      public static NewlineStyles fromGuess(String input, NewlineStyles expected)
      This method determines the newline style given the input that will be parsed.
      Parameters:
      input - is the input that will be parsed.
      expected - is the default new line style.
      Returns:
      the newline style that is present in the input. If no newline style is detected in the input, then return the expected newline style.
